abstract: Mobile phone group Vodafone Group and Spanish carrier Telefonica are taking stakes in a mobile advertising company in a move to battle the threat of online giants Google and Yahoo.
lead_paragraph: Mobile phone group Vodafone Group and Spanish carrier Telefonica are taking stakes in a mobile advertising company in a move to battle the threat of online giants Google and Yahoo.

headline.main: Vodafone, Telefonica Take Stakes in Mobile Ad Start-Up
